00038 namespace Ogre {
00039 
00053     class _OgreExport TextureManager : public ResourceManager, public Singleton<TextureManager>
00054     {
00055     public:
00056 
00057         TextureManager(bool enable32Bit = false) : mIs32Bit(enable32Bit), mDefaultNumMipMaps(0) {}
00058         virtual ~TextureManager();
00059 
00084         virtual Texture * load( 
00085             const String& name, 
00086             int numMipMaps = -1, Real gamma = 1.0f, int priority = 1 );
00087 
00088         virtual Texture * loadImage( 
00089             const String &name, const Image &img, 
00090             int iNumMipMaps = -1, Real gamma = 1.0f, int priority = 1 );
00091 
00094         virtual void unload(String filename);
00095 
00098         virtual void enable32BitTextures(bool setting = true);
00099 
00106         virtual void setDefaultNumMipMaps(int num);
00107 
00110         virtual int getDefaultNumMipMaps()
00111         {
00112             return mDefaultNumMipMaps;
00113         }
00114 
00126         static TextureManager& getSingleton(void);
00127     protected:
00128         bool mIs32Bit;
00129         int mDefaultNumMipMaps;
00130     };
